Firststeps

28 Oct 2023 - Vinayak Deshpande

I am making this website to host my portfolio

I have decided to take the steps neccesary to improve my prospects of employment in a field that is seemingly killing itself through rapid adaptation of AI. I have nothing against AI and think it is very useful.

But, I am following tutorials to make this site so that I can have a portfolio to show off my abilities and skills
